name: e2e-testing-kit
description: Reusable E2E testing kit with Playwright, Allure, and PDF reports

scripts.report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.report:all: npm run allure:generate && npm run report:pdf
scripts.clean: rimraf allure-results allure-report playwright-report test-results "*-e2e-report.pdf" test-report.pdf
scripts.test:report: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run report:all
